text: Cingular Wireless was a mobile phone company from the United States. Cingular Wireless was created in 2000 resulting from a joint venture of SBC Communications Inc. and the BellSouth Corporation. AT&T; Mobility LLC bought Cingular in 2006, subsequently causing Cingular to adopt the AT&T; Wireless name. ==References== Category:American telephone companies Category:Mobile phones Category:Companies based in Atlanta Category:2001 establishments in the United States
title: Cingular Wireless
